ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Soloing at 20
ygData.msgSnippet: You cant have 100 HtH till 30 something.  I believe the formula is lvl+1 *3. I stopped punching around 25 or so, since monsters were riposting me for 50+
ygData.messageBody:
You cant have 100 HtH till 30 something. I believe the formula is lvl+1 *3.
I stopped punching around 25 or so, since monsters were riposting me for 50+
damage...

Soloing at 19: Gorge hounds in East Karana using Denon's, Chords and Hymm
with horn and mandolin. You will also get xp for the big lions there.

To be honest, though I would head over to Lake of Ill Omen. You can find
plent of solable stuff but even better, almost always find a group there.
Its like South Karana but musch less crowded (since many more mobs).
